A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Does it have a few flaws? Yes - much less than The Force Awakens. \n Those flaws do not take away from the overall story/narrative. Took risks where Force Awakens did not.  Bold where Force Awakens was not.  Not predictable.  Not the norm.  Rian Johnson did not chose to play it safe and that's just what the Star Wars-universe needed.  Loved it.
